name: Brackets Ninja: Create Brackets & Tournaments and Easily Manage Them Online
author: Common Ninja

sections.description:
Brackets Ninja is a super powerful plugin for creating and managing brackets and tournaments and easily add them to your website. Brackets Ninja’s brackets are easy to create and manage, and suits for leagues, championships, tournaments, and games.

You may browse our public gallery to see some examples.

IMPORTANT: In order to add a bracket to your WordPress website, you will FIRST need to go to Brackets Ninja, sign up for FREE, and create a new bracket in our bracket maker.

Got any feedback or question? Contact us via contact{at}commoninja.com.

** It’s really easy. Get started in 2 minutes tops, no training needed! **
sections.installation:
Creating a bracket

  1. Create a FREE account at Brackets Ninja.
  2. Create a new bracket by clicking the “Try it now” button on Brackets Ninja’s homepage.
  3. Customize the bracket. Make it beautiful. Add teams & players, select the bracket type (single elimination, double elimination, march madness, etc), and change the look and feel to match your brand.
  4. Click the “Save Changes” button.

Extracting the bracket ID

  1. Go to your account’s dashboard.
  2. Find the bracket you want to add, and click the plugin’s menu (3 dots icon).
  3. Look for the “Add to Site” button and click it.
  4. Under the embeddable code, you’ll see a “Plugin ID” section. Copy the ID, and save it for later.

Attaching a bracket to a WordPress post

  1. Use Bracket Ninja’s shortcode directly in the editor: [bracketsninja bracketid=”YOUR_BRACKET_ID”].
  2. Make sure you replace YOUR_BRACKET_ID with the one from “Extracting the bracket ID” section above.

Arguments provides by the shortcode:

  • ‘bracketid’ – Your plugin ID from Common Ninja
sections.faq:
Q: What is Brackets Ninja?

Brackets Ninja is a powerful tool for web designers, developers, and site owners to create and manage brackets and tournaments online.

Q: What can I use Brackets Ninja for?

You can use Brackets Ninja to create beautiful brackets for leagues, tournaments, and championships, and easily add them to your website

Q: Who can use Brackets Ninja

Everyone. Really, it’s that simple. We’re using innovative and intuitive user interfaces so you don’t need any prior knowledge to use it.

Q: How do I start using Brackets Ninja?

Sign up to Brackets Ninja, create a new bracket and install the Brackets Ninja plugin on your WordPress admin panel.
